resources.string: This application needs to be activated before it can be used.
"Video is adjusted to the device orientation"
Please audio stream and then switch to cameras?
Please stop screen casting and then switch to cameras?
Please enable audio from settings to start streaming.
Monitoring volume keys in the background will drain your battery faster, as it is always running.
"Disable Camera2 API only if you have some issues with camera like some resolutions or framerates are not available."
You can enter the activation code by typing it in the field below or click Scan QR Code.
Does your intended use of this application legally allow AUDIO RECORDING?

This mode hides the recording application behind a fully playable Chess game. To unlock the app, you press the numbers of your Pin code on the left side of the Chessboard. Would you like to use Covert Mode?
Are you sure want to delete this file?
Are you sure want to delete this camera?
Are you sure want to delete the selected file(s)?
There is a new version available. Do you want to update now?
Are you sure want to continue on current wifi connection?
"%1$s: Authentication failure, please check stream credentials."
Please enter your encryption key. The previous recording will not be encrypted.
Your storage is full more than 90%.

string.name: existing_user
string.u: Login with Existing Username and Password

resources.string: Are you sure you would like to exit your application?
You can locate your serial number in the Mobile Activation portal. The address is http://mobileact.vcsrelay.com
"%1$s: RTMP support for HEVC is a non-standard experimental feature. In case of issues please contact our helpdesk."
Are you sure you want to unregister, you will need your username and password to log back in.
Are you sure want to remove this share?
Are you sure want to resend this share?
Activations licenses has been exceeded. Please contact support for assistance.
Your machine code is below. Please type this code into the activation portal to get your activation code.
"You have denied microphone access. Please try again and allow it."
"You have forcefully denied microphone access. Please open settings, go to permissions and allow it."
Oops! Please connect the network and try again!
"Please fill both login and password fields."
"Please also set \"Target type\" to enable RTMP authorization."

string.name: new_user
string.u: I am a new user and need a password

resources.string: "Invalid URL. Can't find rtmp app and stream. Please provide rtmp://host:port/app/stream."
You cannot disable both cameras at once!
You are not allowed to use this app.
Please connect with usb device before start streaming.
Can\'t start streaming while in Settings
Please enter the 6 digit code received\nvia email below
"You have denied some of the required permissions for this action. Please try again and allow them."
"You have forcefully denied some of the required permissions for this action. Please open settings, go to permissions and allow them."
"Stream and record front camera as appears in preview (mirrored)."
Please enter your Pin (4 numbers).\n\nPlease choose a password using only the digits 1 through 8.
"Don't capture video to save power if you need only audio in your stream. All connections will use audio-only mode. Larix Broadcaster will run to background streaming mode."
Pressing Ok button will de-activate your phone, make sure you have your serial number available to re-activate the CheckMate! application.
Are you sure you want to initialize usb camera?
You need to activate app to continue
You can enter the serial number by typing it in the field below or click Scan QR Code.
"Foreground service not ready. Please try again."
"The app has completed its initial setup and configuration. A restart is necessary to finalize and apply all changes. Please restart the app to ensure optimal performance and functionality. Thanks!"
"Restart is necessary to apply changes.\n Start app again for the new updates. Thanks!"
Do you want to import following settings from the link?
Please enter an email to share your device
Are you sure you want to start recording?
Are you sure you want to start streaming?
Are you sure you want to stop recording?
Are you sure you want to stop streaming?
"You have denied storage access. Please try again and allow it."
Android 10 not allow to store in external storage. If you want to store in internal storage click Okay.
Some Android version does not allow to store in external storage. If you want to store in internal storage click Okay.
"You have forcefully denied storage access. Please open settings, go to permissions and allow it."
"%1$s: Unknown error, please try again later."
You cannot add more extra cameras
"Larix doesn't support this type of RTMP authorization. Please use rtmpauth URL parameter or other \"Target type\" for authorization."
"%1$s resolution is not supported by your device's video encoder.\n Stream resolution is 1280x720."
"Larix doesn't support this type of URL (\"%1$s\"). Please enter \"rtmp(s)\", \"rtsp(s)\", \"srt\", \"rist://\"."
"%1$s resolution is not supported by your device's video encoder."
There is not any usb camera connect. Please connect camera.
"User information (\"%1$s\") found in URL. Please fill in \"Login\" and \"Password\" input fields to define stream credentials."
"Video encoding failure, try to change video resolution."
Please wait for few seconds to load configs and try again.
Setting streaming quality to %1$s with a FPS below 30 will apply that setting all recordings.
Are you already on this wifi connection?
You can enter the wifi password by typing it in the field below
%s has a wifi profile for %s it appears you are not connected. Would you like to switch network?
